name: LUONGO CONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT, LLC v. James MACFARLANE
name_abbreviation: Luongo Constr. & Dev., LLC v. MacFarlane

parties:
LUONGO CONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT, LLC
v.
James MACFARLANE
attorneys: The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 272, 170 A.3d 57 (2017), is denied.
casebody.head_matter:
LUONGO CONSTRUCTION AND DEVELOPMENT, LLC
v.
James MACFARLANE
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided December 21, 2017
Frank P. Cannatelli, in support of the petition.
Vincent T. McManus, Jr., in opposition.
The plaintiff's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 176 Conn. App. 272, 170 A.3d 57 (2017), is denied.
